title: Medallion, 5th–7th century
medium:
Medium: Warp; Paired S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spun wools
Technique: slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrapping
dimensions:
H x W: 10.9 x 10.8 cm (4 5/16 x 4 1/4 in. )
Warp: 10.9 cm (4 5/16 inches)
Weft: 10.8 cm (4 1/4 inches)
description: Roundel depicting a female and male figures facing each other. Figures are woven in white, blue, green and yellow on a red ground.  There is a white border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Medallion, 5th–7th century.
5th–7th century. Medium: Warp; Paired S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spun wools
Technique: slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrapping. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-80.
